original: artifacts are open to the public at the
Check out the impressive man busts and how fascinated primitive people are with their reproductive organs.
translated: 看看这些令人印象深刻的半身像，然后再体会一下原始人对自己的生殖器是多么着迷。
用真正的尸体演示木乃伊的制作。

original: Admire the shiny helmets and long swords of violent lunatics!
translated: 欣赏那些属于疯子暴力狂的长剑和闪亮头盔吧！

original: Did they exist?  (Note - exhibit changed after heavy lobbying by family groups.)
translated: 恐龙真的存在吗？ (注：因家族观念团体的投诉举报，现已变更展览内容。)
